TopicTitle: Can't transmit science from Science module and I can't perform a survey scan.

Articles.Content: So I have been trying to get a survey of the surface of both Mun and Kerbin. I've tried various altitudes on the polar orbit of Kerbin and nothing. My heading was 358 on kerbin. I have a ton of electricity stored up, 3 antenna's and solar panels. Is there any reason why both the survey's will not complete and also why I can't transmit my science from orbiting science modules? I've even brought a few back to earth but the research done in the module doesn't get counted to my science score. I am playing in the science sandbox model, I have science alert, stage recovery, and ubioweld for my mods. My kerbals need more science!
Science alert is the reason you can't transmit.
Thanks a million, gonna remove it now then.
